content: Food forests are still relatively uncommon but are gaining popularity as a sustainable and resilient form of food production. They can be found in various parts of the world, including urban and rural areas. You can try searching online for "food forests near me" and see if there is one in your area. Alternatively, you can contact local environmental or food organizations, community gardens, or permaculture groups to ask if they know of any food forests nearby. You could also consider starting one yourself, as they can be established on public or private land with community cooperation and support.
